ð LOGIN PAGE (login.html)

ð§ HTML Part

  • A simple form with:

    • Username input

    • Password input

    • A checkbox to toggle show/hide password

    • A submit button

ð§  JavaScript Logic

1. â Check if already logged in

js
if(localStorage.length == 0){
    // Do nothing
}else{
    alert("Please Logout Manually")
    window.location.href = "welcome.html"
}

  • If localStorage has data, it assumes the user is already logged in and redirects to Welcome page with an alert.

2. ðï¸ Show/Hide Password Toggle

js
abc.addEventListener("click", () => {
  var password = document.getElementById("txtpass");
  password.type = password.type === "password" ? "text" : "password";
});

  • If checkbox is clicked, it toggles password field visibility.

3. ð Login (Form Submission)

js
form.addEventListener("submit", (e) => {
  e.preventDefault();
  var name = document.getElementById("txtname").value;
  var password = document.getElementById("txtpass").value;
  localStorage.setItem("UserName", name);
  localStorage.setItem("password", password);
  window.location.href = "Welcome.html";
});

  • Prevents form default submission

  • Stores entered name and password into localStorage

  • Redirects to the Welcome page

ð WELCOME PAGE (Welcome.html)

ð§ HTML Part

  • A navigation bar with 5 links: Home, About, Contact, Services, Logout

  • A welcome message: Welcome Mr. [username]

ð§  JavaScript Logic

1. ð Check Login Status

js

var currentPass = localStorage.getItem("password");

if(currentUser == null && currentPass == null){
    alert("Please Login First");
    window.location.href = "login.html";
}

  • If no login info is found, user is redirected to login page

2. ð Display Welcome Message

js
var welcome = document.getElementById("welcome");
welcome.textContent += currentUser;

  • Adds the stored username to the welcome message

3. ðª Logout Function

js
function logout(){
    localStorage.removeItem("UserName");
    localStorage.removeItem("password");
}

  • Removes login data from localStorage when logout is clicked

  • Note: It doesnât redirect to login â you can add that manually:

js
window.location.href = "login.html";

â ï¸ Important Notes

  • â Security Warning: This is a very basic login system for demonstration purposes.

  • â Great for practice, UI testing, or frontend concepts

â Add this JavaScript before </body>:

html
<script>
function validation() {
  const name = document.getElementById("name").value;
  const email = document.getElementById("email").value;
  const phone = document.getElementById("phone").value;
  const workPhone = document.getElementById("workPhone").value;
  const password = document.getElementById("password").value;

  const nameError = /^[a-zA-Z. ]{3,}$/;
  const emailError = /^[a-zA-Z0-9._%+-]+@[a-zA-Z]+\.[a-zA-Z]{2,}$/;
  const phoneError = /^[0-9]{11}$/;
  const passwordError = /^(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*\d)(?=.*[@$!%*?&]).{8,}$/;

  if (!nameError.test(name)) {
    document.getElementById("nameError").innerHTML = "Invalid name";
    return false;
  } else {
    document.getElementById("nameError").innerHTML = "";
  }

  if (!emailError.test(email)) {
    document.getElementById("emailError").innerHTML = "Invalid email";
    return false;
  } else {
    document.getElementById("emailError").innerHTML = "";
  }

  if (!phoneError.test(phone)) {
    document.getElementById("phoneError").innerHTML = "Invalid Cell No (11 digits)";
    return false;
  } else {
    document.getElementById("phoneError").innerHTML = "";
  }

  if (!phoneError.test(workPhone)) {
    document.getElementById("workPhoneError").innerHTML = "Invalid Work Phone No (11 digits)";
    return false;
  } else {
    document.getElementById("workPhoneError").innerHTML = "";
  }

  if (!passwordError.test(password)) {
    document.getElementById("passwordError").innerHTML = "Password must be 8+ chars, include UPPERCASE, lowercase, number, symbol";
    return false;
  } else {
    document.getElementById("passwordError").innerHTML = "";
  }

  return true;
}
</script>

â New fields: Name, Address, Work Phone, Cell No, Date of Birth, Category

â Complete register.php File:

php
<?php
session_start();
error_reporting(E_ALL);
ini_set('display_errors', 1);
$conn = new mysqli('localhost', 'root', '', 'makehub');

$response = '';

if ($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] === 'POST' && isset($_POST['btnregister'])) {
    $name = $_POST['name'] ?? '';
    $address = $_POST['address'] ?? '';
    $work_phone = $_POST['work_phone'] ?? '';
    $cell_no = $_POST['cell_no'] ?? '';
    $dob = $_POST['dob'] ?? '';
    $category = $_POST['category'] ?? '';
    $email = $_POST['email'] ?? '';
    $password = $_POST['password'] ?? '';
    $confirmPassword = $_POST['confirmPassword'] ?? '';

    if ($password !== $confirmPassword) {
        $response = "Swal.fire('Password Mismatch', 'â Password and Confirm Password do not match.', 'error');";
    } else {
        $check = $conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = ?");
        $check->bind_param("s", $email);
        $check->execute();
        $result = $check->get_result();

        if ($result->num_rows > 0) {
            $response = "Swal.fire('Already Exists', 'â ï¸ Email already exists.', 'warning');";
        } else {
            $stmt = $conn->prepare("INSERT INTO users (name, address, work_phone, cell_no, dob, category, email, password) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)");
            if ($stmt) {
                $stmt->bind_param("ssssssss", $name, $address, $work_phone, $cell_no, $dob, $category, $email, $password);
                if ($stmt->execute()) {
                    $_SESSION['user_id'] = $conn->insert_id;
                    $_SESSION['name'] = $name;
                    $_SESSION['email'] = $email;

                    $response = "Swal.fire({
                        title: 'Registration Successful!',
                        text: 'Welcome, $name!',
                        icon: 'success',
                        timer: 2000,
                        showConfirmButton: false
                    }).then(() => {
                        window.location.href = 'index.php';
                    });";
                } else {
                    $response = "Swal.fire('Error', 'â Execute failed: {$stmt->error}', 'error');";
                }
                $stmt->close();
            } else {
                $response = "Swal.fire('Error', 'â Prepare failed: {$conn->error}', 'error');";
            }
        }
        $check->close();
    }
}
?>

<script>
function togglePassword(icon, fieldName) {
  const field = document.querySelector(`input[name="${fieldName}"]`);
  field.type = field.type === 'password' ? 'text' : 'password';
  icon.classList.toggle('fa-eye');
  icon.classList.toggle('fa-eye-slash');
}

function validation() {
  const name = document.getElementById("name").value;
  const email = document.getElementById("email").value;
  const phone = document.getElementById("phone").value;
  const workPhone = document.getElementById("workPhone").value;
  const password = document.getElementById("password").value;

  const nameError = /^[a-zA-Z. ]{3,}$/;
  const emailError = /^[a-zA-Z0-9._%+-]+@[a-zA-Z]+\.[a-zA-Z]{2,}$/;
  const phoneError = /^[0-9]{11}$/;
  const passwordError = /^(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*\d)(?=.*[@$!%*?&]).{8,}$/;

  if (!nameError.test(name)) {
    document.getElementById("nameError").innerHTML = "Invalid name";
    return false;
  } else {
    document.getElementById("nameError").innerHTML = "";
  }

  if (!emailError.test(email)) {
    document.getElementById("emailError").innerHTML = "Invalid email";
    return false;
  } else {
    document.getElementById("emailError").innerHTML = "";
  }

  if (!phoneError.test(phone)) {
    document.getElementById("phoneError").innerHTML = "Invalid Cell No (11 digits)";
    return false;
  } else {
    document.getElementById("phoneError").innerHTML = "";
  }

  if (!phoneError.test(workPhone)) {
    document.getElementById("workPhoneError").innerHTML = "Invalid Work Phone No (11 digits)";
    return false;
  } else {
    document.getElementById("workPhoneError").innerHTML = "";
  }

  if (!passwordError.test(password)) {
    document.getElementById("passwordError").innerHTML = "Password must be 8+ chars, include UPPERCASE, lowercase, number, symbol";
    return false;
  } else {
    document.getElementById("passwordError").innerHTML = "";
  }

  return true;
}
</script>

<?php
session_start();
error_reporting(E_ALL);
ini_set('display_errors', 1);

// Connect to database
$conn = new mysqli('localhost', 'root', '', 'makehub');
if ($conn->connect_error) {
    die("Connection failed: " . $conn->connect_error);
}

$response = '';

if ($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] === 'POST' && isset($_POST['btnregister'])) {
    $name = $_POST['name'] ?? '';
    $address = $_POST['address'] ?? '';
    $work_phone = $_POST['work_phone'] ?? '';
    $cell_no = $_POST['cell_no'] ?? '';
    $dob = $_POST['dob'] ?? '';
    $category = $_POST['category'] ?? '';
    $email = $_POST['email'] ?? '';
    $password = $_POST['password'] ?? '';
    $confirmPassword = $_POST['confirmPassword'] ?? '';

    // Validation
    if ($password !== $confirmPassword) {
        $response = "Swal.fire('Password Mismatch', 'â Password and Confirm Password do not match.', 'error');";
    } else {
        $check = $conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = ?");
        $check->bind_param("s", $email);
        $check->execute();
        $result = $check->get_result();

        if ($result->num_rows > 0) {
            $response = "Swal.fire('Already Exists', 'â ï¸ Email already exists.', 'warning');";
        } else {
            // Password hashing recommended
            $hashedPassword = password_hash($password, PASSWORD_DEFAULT);
            $stmt = $conn->prepare("INSERT INTO users (name, address, work_phone, cell_no, dob, category, email, password) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)");
            if ($stmt) {
                $stmt->bind_param("ssssssss", $name, $address, $work_phone, $cell_no, $dob, $category, $email, $hashedPassword);
                if ($stmt->execute()) {
                    $_SESSION['user_id'] = $conn->insert_id;
                    $_SESSION['name'] = $name;
                    $_SESSION['email'] = $email;

                    $response = "Swal.fire({
                        title: 'Registration Successful!',
                        text: 'Welcome, $name!',
                        icon: 'success',
                        timer: 2000,
                        showConfirmButton: false
                    }).then(() => {
                        window.location.href = 'index.php';
                    });";
                } else {
                    $response = "Swal.fire('Error', 'â Execute failed: {$stmt->error}', 'error');";
                }
                $stmt->close();
            } else {
                $response = "Swal.fire('Error', 'â Prepare failed: {$conn->error}', 'error');";
            }
        }
        $check->close();
    }
}

function togglePassword(icon, fieldName) {
  const field = document.querySelector(`input[name="${fieldName}"]`);

function validation() {
  const name = document.getElementById("name").value;
  const email = document.getElementById("email").value;
  const phone = document.getElementById("phone").value;
  const workPhone = document.getElementById("workPhone").value;
  const password = document.getElementById("password").value;

  const nameRegex = /^[a-zA-Z. ]{3,}$/;
  const emailRegex = /^[a-zA-Z0-9._%+-]+@[a-zA-Z]+\.[a-zA-Z]{2,}$/;
  const phoneRegex = /^[0-9]{11}$/;
  const passRegex = /^(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*\d)(?=.*[@$!%*?&]).{8,}$/;

  if (!nameRegex.test(name)) {
    document.getElementById("nameError").innerHTML = "Invalid name";
    return false;
  } else { document.getElementById("nameError").innerHTML = ""; }

  if (!emailRegex.test(email)) {
    document.getElementById("emailError").innerHTML = "Invalid email";
    return false;
  } else { document.getElementById("emailError").innerHTML = ""; }

  if (!phoneRegex.test(phone)) {
    document.getElementById("phoneError").innerHTML = "Cell No must be 11 digits";
    return false;
  } else { document.getElementById("phoneError").innerHTML = ""; }

  if (!phoneRegex.test(workPhone)) {
    document.getElementById("workPhoneError").innerHTML = "Work Phone must be 11 digits";
    return false;
  } else { document.getElementById("workPhoneError").innerHTML = ""; }

  if (!passRegex.test(password)) {
    document.getElementById("passwordError").innerHTML = "Password must be 8+ chars, UPPERCASE, lowercase, digit, special char";
    return false;
  } else { document.getElementById("passwordError").innerHTML = ""; }

  return true;
}

You said:
Cannot delete or update a parent row: a foreign key constraint fails
ChatGPT said:

The error:

Cannot delete or update a parent row: a foreign key constraint fails

means your users table is referenced by another table using a foreign key, and MySQL is preventing you from deleting or modifying it to maintain data integrity.

ð Example Scenario

Let's say you have a purchases or orders table that has a foreign key like:

sql
FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)

This means that as long as there are rows in purchases linked to users, you cannot delete or drop the users table without handling this dependency first.

â 3 Solutions You Can Choose From:

â Option 1: Drop Dependent Tables Temporarily (Best if Youâre Starting Fresh)

If you donât need existing data:

sql
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS purchases;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS users;

Then re-create users with the new structure.

â Option 2: Remove Foreign Key Constraints Temporarily

Find and drop the foreign key constraint, then drop the users table.

Step 1: Find foreign key constraint

Run this query (replace purchases with your table name if needed):

sql
SELECT CONSTRAINT_NAME 
FROM information_schema.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE 
WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'purchases' AND REFERENCED_TABLE_NAME = 'users';

Step 2: Drop the constraint

sql
ALTER TABLE purchases DROP FOREIGN KEY fk_user_id;

(Replace fk_user_id with the actual name you found above)

Step 3: Drop the users table

sql
DROP TABLE users;

â Option 3: Truncate or Delete All Related Child Rows First

If your app depends on related records (like orders, purchases), you can delete child rows first:

sql
DELETE FROM purchases;
DELETE FROM users;

Then proceed to alter or drop the table.

ð¡ï¸ Recommended for Fresh Projects

If you're testing or setting up a fresh project:

sql
SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS = 0;
DROP TABLE users;
SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS = 1;

â ï¸ This disables foreign key checks temporarily, so use only when you're sure what you're doing.

â What Should You Do Now?

If you're just building/testing and want to replace your users table:

sql
SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS = 0;
DROP TABLE users;
SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS = 1;

Then create the new users table as discussed.

Let me know if you want:

  • Help finding which table is causing the constraint

  • A safer migration strategy instead of dropping

I'm here to guide you through it.

â â â ROOT CAUSE: onsubmit="return validation()" returns false

Your validation() function has a mistake:

js
if (!passRegex.test(password)) {
  document.getElementById("passwordError").innerHTML = "";
  return false;
}

You're not showing an error, but still returning false, which blocks the form submission.

â â â FIXES (You must apply these):

â 1. Fix the password validation block:

Replace:

js
if (!passRegex.test(password)) {
  document.getElementById("passwordError").innerHTML = "";
  return false;
}

With:

js
if (!passRegex.test(password)) {
  document.getElementById("passwordError").innerHTML = "Password must be at least 8 characters, include uppercase, lowercase, digit and symbol.";
  return false;
} else {
  document.getElementById("passwordError").innerHTML = "";
}

â 2. Check that your <form> tag doesnât interfere with PHP:

You're already using:

html
<form method="POST" onsubmit="return validation()">

Thatâs okay as long as validation() returns true. So after fixing the password block, your form will now submit and PHP will process it.

â 3. Check Database Structure

Make sure your users table is created like this (matches PHP fields exactly):

sql
CREATE TABLE users (
    id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    address TEXT,
    work_phone VARCHAR(20),
    cell_no VARCHAR(20),
    dob DATE,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(150) UNIQUE,
    password VARCHAR(255)
);

You can do this in phpMyAdminâs SQL tab.

<?php 
session_start();
error_reporting(E_ALL);
ini_set('display_errors', 1);

$conn = new mysqli('localhost', 'root', '', 'makehub');
if ($conn->connect_error) {
    die("Connection failed: " . $conn->connect_error);
}

$response = '';

if ($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] === 'POST' && isset($_POST['btnregister'])) {
    $name = $_POST['name'] ?? '';
    $address = $_POST['address'] ?? '';
    $work_phone = $_POST['work_phone'] ?? '';
    $cell_no = $_POST['cell_no'] ?? '';
    $dob = $_POST['dob'] ?? '';
    $category = $_POST['category'] ?? '';
    $email = $_POST['email'] ?? '';
    $password = $_POST['password'] ?? '';
    $confirmPassword = $_POST['confirmPassword'] ?? '';

    if ($password !== $confirmPassword) {
        $response = "Swal.fire('Password Mismatch', 'â Password and Confirm Password do not match.', 'error');";
    } else {
        $check = $conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = ?");
        $check->bind_param("s", $email);
        $check->execute();
        $result = $check->get_result();

        if ($result->num_rows > 0) {
            $response = "Swal.fire('Already Exists', 'â ï¸ Email already exists.', 'warning');";
        } else {
            $hashedPassword = password_hash($password, PASSWORD_DEFAULT);
            $stmt = $conn->prepare("INSERT INTO users (name, address, work_phone, cell_no, dob, category, email, password) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)");
            if ($stmt) {
                $stmt->bind_param("ssssssss", $name, $address, $work_phone, $cell_no, $dob, $category, $email, $hashedPassword);
                if ($stmt->execute()) {
                    $_SESSION['user_id'] = $conn->insert_id;
                    $_SESSION['name'] = $name;
                    $_SESSION['email'] = $email;
                    $response = "Swal.fire({
                        title: 'Registration Successful!',
                        text: 'Welcome, $name!',
                        icon: 'success',
                        timer: 2000,
                        showConfirmButton: false
                    }).then(() => {
                        window.location.href = 'index.php';
                    });";
                } else {
                    $response = "Swal.fire('Error', 'â Could not save: {$stmt->error}', 'error');";
                }
                $stmt->close();
            } else {
                $response = "Swal.fire('Error', 'â Prepare failed: {$conn->error}', 'error');";
            }
        }
        $check->close();
    }
}

<script>
function togglePassword(icon, fieldName) {
  const field = document.querySelector(`input[name="${fieldName}"]`);
  field.type = field.type === 'password' ? 'text' : 'password';
  icon.classList.toggle('fa-eye');
  icon.classList.toggle('fa-eye-slash');
}

function validation() {
  const name = document.getElementById("name").value;
  const email = document.getElementById("email").value;
  const phone = document.getElementById("phone").value;
  const workPhone = document.getElementById("workPhone").value;
  const password = document.getElementById("password").value;

  const nameRegex = /^[a-zA-Z. ]{3,}$/;
  const emailRegex = /^[a-zA-Z0-9._%+-]+@[a-zA-Z]+\.[a-zA-Z]{2,}$/;
  const phoneRegex = /^[0-9]{11}$/;
  const passRegex = /^(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*\d)(?=.*[@$!%*?&]).{8,}$/;

  if (!nameRegex.test(name)) {
    document.getElementById("nameError").innerHTML = "Invalid name";
    return false;
  } else { document.getElementById("nameError").innerHTML = ""; }

  if (!emailRegex.test(email)) {
    document.getElementById("emailError").innerHTML = "Invalid email";
    return false;
  } else { document.getElementById("emailError").innerHTML = ""; }

  if (!phoneRegex.test(phone)) {
    document.getElementById("phoneError").innerHTML = "Cell No must be 11 digits";
    return false;
  } else { document.getElementById("phoneError").innerHTML = ""; }

  if (!phoneRegex.test(workPhone)) {
    document.getElementById("workPhoneError").innerHTML = "Work Phone must be 11 digits";
    return false;
  } else { document.getElementById("workPhoneError").innerHTML = ""; }

  if (!passRegex.test(password)) {
    document.getElementById("passwordError").innerHTML = "Password must be at least 8 characters, include uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character.";
    return false;
  } else { document.getElementById("passwordError").innerHTML = ""; }

  return true;
}
</script>

<?php 
session_start();

ini_set('display_errors', 1);

if ($conn->connect_error) {
    die("Connection failed: " . $conn->connect_error);
}

$response = '';

if ($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] === 'POST' && isset($_POST['btnregister'])) {
    $name = $_POST['name'] ?? '';
    $address = $_POST['address'] ?? '';
    $work_phone = $_POST['work_phone'] ?? '';
    $cell_no = $_POST['cell_no'] ?? '';
    $dob = $_POST['dob'] ?? '';
    $category = $_POST['category'] ?? '';
    $email = $_POST['email'] ?? '';
    $password = $_POST['password'] ?? '';
    $confirmPassword = $_POST['confirmPassword'] ?? '';

    if ($password !== $confirmPassword) {
        $response = "Swal.fire('Password Mismatch', 'â Password and Confirm Password do not match.', 'error');";
    } else {
        $check = $conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = ?");
        $check->bind_param("s", $email);
        $check->execute();
        $result = $check->get_result();

        if ($result->num_rows > 0) {
            $response = "Swal.fire('Already Exists', 'â ï¸ Email already exists.', 'warning');";
        } else {
            $stmt = $conn->prepare("INSERT INTO users (name, address, work_phone, cell_no, dob, category, email, password) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)");
            if ($stmt) {
                $stmt->bind_param("ssssssss", $name, $address, $work_phone, $cell_no, $dob, $category, $email, $password);
                if ($stmt->execute()) {
                    $_SESSION['user_id'] = $conn->insert_id;
                    $_SESSION['name'] = $name;
                    $_SESSION['email'] = $email;

                    $response = "Swal.fire({
                        title: 'Registration Successful!',
                        text: 'Welcome, $name!',
                        icon: 'success',
                        timer: 2000,
                        showConfirmButton: false
                    }).then(() => {
                        window.location.href = 'index.php';
                    });";
                } else {
                    $response = "Swal.fire('Error', 'â Could not save: {$stmt->error}', 'error');";
                }
                $stmt->close();
            } else {
                $response = "Swal.fire('Error', 'â Prepare failed: {$conn->error}', 'error');";
            }
        }
        $check->close();
    }
}

<script>
function togglePassword(icon, fieldName) {
  const field = document.querySelector(`input[name="${fieldName}"]`);
  field.type = field.type === 'password' ? 'text' : 'password';
  icon.classList.toggle('fa-eye');
  icon.classList.toggle('fa-eye-slash');
}

function validation() {
  const name = document.getElementById("name").value;
  const email = document.getElementById("email").value;
  const phone = document.getElementById("phone").value;
  const workPhone = document.getElementById("workPhone").value;

  const nameRegex = /^[a-zA-Z. ]{3,}$/;
  const emailRegex = /^[a-zA-Z0-9._%+-]+@[a-zA-Z]+\.[a-zA-Z]{2,}$/;
  const phoneRegex = /^[0-9]{11}$/;

  if (!nameRegex.test(name)) {
    document.getElementById("nameError").innerHTML = "Invalid name";
    return false;
  } else { document.getElementById("nameError").innerHTML = ""; }

  if (!emailRegex.test(email)) {
    document.getElementById("emailError").innerHTML = "Invalid email";
    return false;
  } else { document.getElementById("emailError").innerHTML = ""; }

  if (!phoneRegex.test(phone)) {
    document.getElementById("phoneError").innerHTML = "Cell No must be 11 digits";

    return false;

  return true;
}

php
<?php
session_start();

// Redirect if user is not logged in
if (!isset($_SESSION['user_id'])) {
    header('Location: login.php');
    exit();
}

$conn = new mysqli('localhost', 'root', '', 'makehub');
$user_id = $_SESSION['user_id'];

// Handle profile update
if ($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] === 'POST' && isset($_POST['updateProfile'])) {
    $first = $_POST['first_name'] ?? '';
    $last = $_POST['last_name'] ?? '';
    $email = $_POST['email'] ?? '';
    $username = $_POST['username'] ?? '';

    $update = $conn->prepare("UPDATE users SET first_name=?, last_name=?, email=?, username=? WHERE id=?");
    $update->bind_param("ssssi", $first, $last, $email, $username, $user_id);

    if ($update->execute()) {
        $_SESSION['first_name'] = $first;
        $_SESSION['last_name'] = $last;
        $_SESSION['email'] = $email;
        $_SESSION['username'] = $username;
        $message = "<script>Swal.fire('Profile Updated', 'Your profile has been updated successfully.', 'success');</script>";
    } else {
        $message = "<script>Swal.fire('Error', 'Failed to update profile.', 'error');</script>";
    }
    $update->close();
}

// Fetch current user info
$result = $conn->query("SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = $user_id");
$user = $result->fetch_assoc();
?>

means your code is trying to select or use a column named username in the users table, but that column does not exist in your database.

Here is your fully updated cart.php file, based on:

  • Fixing the username error (using name instead)

â cart.php (Corrected & Updated)

php
<?php 
session_start();

// Redirect if not logged in
if (!isset($_SESSION['user_id'])) {
    header('Location: login.php');
    exit();
}

// Include DB connection
require_once 'conn.php';

// Fetch user info
$user_id = $_SESSION['user_id'];
$stmt = $conn->prepare("SELECT name FROM users WHERE id = ?");
$stmt->bind_param("i", $user_id);
$stmt->execute();
$result = $stmt->get_result();
$user = $result->fetch_assoc();
$username = $user['name']; // You can use this for display if needed

// Handle cart operations
if ($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] === 'POST') {
    $product_name = $_POST['product_name'] ?? '';
    $product_image = $_POST['product_image'] ?? '';
    $action = $_POST['action'] ?? 'add';

    // Sanitize price
    $product_price = 0;
    if (isset($_POST['product_price'])) {
        $clean_price = preg_replace('/[^\d.]/', '', $_POST['product_price']);
        $product_price = floatval($clean_price);
    }

    $quantity = isset($_POST['quantity']) ? max(1, intval($_POST['quantity'])) : 1;

    if (!isset($_SESSION['cart'])) {
        $_SESSION['cart'] = [];
    }

    // Delete item
    if ($action === 'delete') {
        foreach ($_SESSION['cart'] as $key => $item) {
            if ($item['product_name'] === $product_name) {
                unset($_SESSION['cart'][$key]);
                $_SESSION['cart'] = array_values($_SESSION['cart']); // reindex array
                break;
            }
        }
        header('Location: cart.php');
        exit();
    }

    // Update quantity
    if ($action === 'update') {
        foreach ($_SESSION['cart'] as &$item) {
            if ($item['product_name'] === $product_name) {
                $item['quantity'] = $quantity;
                break;
            }
        }
        unset($item);
        header('Location: cart.php');
        exit();
    }

    // Add to cart
    $found = false;
    foreach ($_SESSION['cart'] as &$item) {
        if ($item['product_name'] === $product_name) {
            $item['quantity'] += $quantity;
            $found = true;
            break;
        }
    }
    unset($item);

    if (!$found) {
        $_SESSION['cart'][] = [
            'product_name' => $product_name,
            'product_price' => $product_price,
            'product_image' => $product_image,
            'quantity' => $quantity
        ];
    }

    header("Location: cart.php");
    exit();
}
?>

php
<?php 
session_start();
require_once 'conn.php';

// Redirect if user not logged in
if (!isset($_SESSION['user_id'])) {
    header("Location: index.php");
    exit();
}

// Fetch user name (instead of 'username')
$user_id = $_SESSION['user_id'];
$user_name = '';
$stmt = $conn->prepare("SELECT name FROM users WHERE id = ?");
$stmt->bind_param("i", $user_id);
$stmt->execute();
$stmt->bind_result($user_name);
$stmt->fetch();
$stmt->close();

// Handle checkout
if ($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] == 'POST' && isset($_POST['checkout'])) {
    if (!empty($_SESSION['cart'])) {
        foreach ($_SESSION['cart'] as $item) {
            $name = $item['product_name'];
            $price = (float)$item['product_price'];
            $quantity = (int)$item['quantity'];
            $total = $price * $quantity;
            $stmt = $conn->prepare("INSERT INTO purchases (user_id, username, product_name, product_price, quantity, total) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)");
            $stmt->bind_param("issdii", $user_id, $user_name, $name, $price, $quantity, $total);
            $stmt->execute();
        }
        unset($_SESSION['cart']);
        echo "<script>alert('Order placed successfully!'); window.location='index.php';</script>";
        exit();
    }
}
?>

    $update->bind_param("sssssssi", $name, $address, $work_phone, $cell_no, $dob, $category, $email, $user_id);

ChatGPT said:

To display newly added products at the top instead of the bottom, you do NOT need to change the database structure or the SQL. Since you're using a JSON file (cosmetics.json or jewelery.json), all you need to do is reverse the array when reading it.

â Update This Line in Your Code:

Currently:

php
$data = json_decode(file_get_contents($filePath), true);

ð Replace it with this:

php
$data = array_reverse(json_decode(file_get_contents($filePath), true));

â Result:

  • Newest products (last written to the JSON file) will appear first at the top in the admin dashboard table.

  • No need to change the way you save data unless you want to insert it at the beginning of the JSON array too (let me know if yes).

Would you also like:

  • To automatically assign latest ID at the top when adding?

  • To apply this to the frontend product list too?

I can adjust that for you instantly.

â Final Updated add-product.php (fully styled and functional):

php
<?php
session_start();
if ($_SERVER["REQUEST_METHOD"] === "POST") {
  $category = $_POST['category'] ?? 'cosmetics';
  $name = $_POST['name'];
  $brand = $_POST['brand'];
  $price = $_POST['price'];
  $description = $_POST['description'];

  $filePath = $category === 'jewelery' ? './json/jewelery.json' : './json/cosmetics.json';
  $imageDir = $category === 'jewelery' ? 'images/jewelery/' : 'images/cosmetics/';

  $allowedTypes = ['image/jpeg', 'image/png', 'image/gif', 'image/webp'];
  $image1Type = mime_content_type($_FILES['image1']['tmp_name']);
  $image2Type = mime_content_type($_FILES['image2']['tmp_name']);

  if (!in_array($image1Type, $allowedTypes) || !in_array($image2Type, $allowedTypes)) {
    echo "<script>alert('â Only image files are allowed (JPG, PNG, GIF, WEBP)'); window.history.back();</script>";
    exit;
  }

  $data = file_exists($filePath) ? json_decode(file_get_contents($filePath), true) : [];
  $id = count($data) > 0 ? end($data)['id'] + 1 : 1;

  $img1Name = basename($_FILES['image1']['name']);
  $img2Name = basename($_FILES['image2']['name']);
  move_uploaded_file($_FILES['image1']['tmp_name'], $imageDir . $img1Name);
  move_uploaded_file($_FILES['image2']['tmp_name'], $imageDir . $img2Name);

  $newProduct = [
    'id' => $id,
    'name' => $name,
    'brand' => $brand,
    'category' => $category,
    'price' => $price,
    'description' => $description,
    'image1' => $imageDir . $img1Name,
    'image2' => $imageDir . $img2Name
  ];

  // Add at top of JSON array
  array_unshift($data, $newProduct);
  file_put_contents($filePath, json_encode($data, JSON_PRETTY_PRINT));

  header("Location: admin-dashboard.php?category=$category");
  exit;
}
?>

php
<?php 
session_start();
if ($_SERVER["REQUEST_METHOD"] === "POST") {
  $category = $_POST['category'] ?? 'cosmetics';
  $name = $_POST['name'];
  $brand = $_POST['brand'];
  $price = $_POST['price'];
  $description = $_POST['description'];

  $filePath = $category === 'jewelery' ? './json/jewelery.json' : './json/cosmetics.json';
  $imageDir = $category === 'jewelery' ? 'images/jewelery/' : 'images/cosmetics/';

  $allowedTypes = ['image/jpeg', 'image/png', 'image/gif', 'image/webp'];
  $image1Type = mime_content_type($_FILES['image1']['tmp_name']);
  $image2Type = mime_content_type($_FILES['image2']['tmp_name']);

  if (!in_array($image1Type, $allowedTypes) || !in_array($image2Type, $allowedTypes)) {
    echo "<script>
        alert('â Only image files are allowed (JPG, PNG, GIF, WEBP)');
        window.history.back();
    </script>";
    exit;
  }

  $data = file_exists($filePath) ? json_decode(file_get_contents($filePath), true) : [];
  $id = count($data) > 0 ? end($data)['id'] + 1 : 1;

  $img1Name = basename($_FILES['image1']['name']);
  $img2Name = basename($_FILES['image2']['name']);

  move_uploaded_file($_FILES['image1']['tmp_name'], $imageDir . $img1Name);
  move_uploaded_file($_FILES['image2']['tmp_name'], $imageDir . $img2Name);

  $newProduct = [
    'id' => $id,
    'name' => $name,
    'brand' => $brand,
    'category' => $category,
    'price' => $price,
    'description' => $description,
    'image1' => $imageDir . $img1Name,
    'image2' => $imageDir . $img2Name
  ];

  $data[] = $newProduct;
  file_put_contents($filePath, json_encode($data, JSON_PRETTY_PRINT));

  header("Location: admin-dashboard.php?category=$category");
  exit;
}
?>
